dcterms:creator: M. M. M. Manhães
S. A. Scherer
M. Voss
L. R. Douat
T. Rauschenbach
dcterms:description: A gazebo-based package for underwater intervention and multi-robot simulation, used for testing methods in path following tasks for Autonomous Underwater Vehicles (AUV).
dcterms:title: Gazebo platform

dcterms:creator: M. M. M. Manhães
S. A. Scherer
M. Voss
L. R. Douat
T. Rauschenbach
dcterms:description: A modified version of the AUV simulator used for testing the proposed deep interactive reinforcement learning method in path following tasks.
dcterms:title: Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (AUV) Simulator

dcterms:creator: T. I. Fossen
M. Breivik
R. Skjetne
dcterms:description: An algorithm for line-of-sight path following of underactuated marine craft, referenced in the context of defining desired course angles for AUV path following tasks.
dcterms:title: Line-of-sight (LOS) algorithm
